name: TVLockupHeaderFooterView
desc: A view that contains header and footer information.

items.name: var titleLabel: UILabel?
items.desc: The title for a header or footer.

items.name: var subtitleLabel: UILabel?
items.desc: The subtitle for a header or footer.

items.name: var showsOnlyWhenAncestorFocused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether titles and subtitles are displayed when a lockup view isn't in focus.
